languages.text: "Помни о милосердии. Те, на кого ты охотишься, сами могут быть жертвами".
"Be merciful. Those whom you hunt may be victims themselves."
languages.original_text: "Помни о милосердии. Те, на кого ты охотишься, сами могут быть жертвами".

traits.locale_text: "Be merciful. Those that you hunt may be victims themselves."
"Be merciful. Those that you hunt may be victims themselves."
"Be merciful. Those whom you hunt may be victims themselves."
"Be merciful. Those whom you hunt may be victims themselves."
"Be merciful. Those whom you hunt may be victims themselves."
"Be merciful. Those whom you hunt may be victims themselves."

languages.text: "Seid gnädig. Diejenigen, die Ihr jagt, könnten selbst Opfer sein."
languages.original_text: "Be merciful. Those whom you hunt may be victims themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Seid gnädig. Diejenigen, die Ihr jagt, könnten selbst Opfer sein."

languages.text: «Tenga compasión. Aquellos a quienes da caza pueden ser víctimas».
languages.original_text: "Be merciful. Those whom you hunt may be victims themselves."

traits.locale_text: «Tenga compasión. Aquellos a quienes da caza pueden ser víctimas».

languages.text: 「慈悲深くあれ。狩る側が、犠牲者だったかもしれないのだから」
languages.original_text: "Be merciful. Those whom you hunt may be victims themselves."

traits.locale_text: 「慈悲深くあれ。狩る側が、犠牲者だったかもしれないのだから」

languages.text: “希望你能仁慈些。你准备猎杀的那些人，他们本人可能也是受害者。”
languages.original_text: "Be merciful. Those whom you hunt may be victims themselves."

traits.locale_text: “希望你能仁慈些。你准备猎杀的那些人，他们本人可能也是受害者。”

languages.text: « Faites preuve de miséricorde. Ceux que vous pourchassez pourraient bien être des victimes, eux aussi. »
languages.original_text: "Be merciful. Those whom you hunt may be victims themselves."

traits.locale_text: « Faites preuve de miséricorde. Ceux que vous pourchassez pourraient bien être des victimes, eux aussi. »

languages.text: "Merhametli ol. Av olarak peşine düştüklerin belki de birer kurbandan ibarettir."
languages.original_text: "Be merciful. Those whom you hunt may be victims themselves."
